pullRequest.title: [BEAM-10397] add missing environment in windowing strategy for Dataflow
pullRequest.bodyText:
Thank you for your contribution! Follow this checklist to help us incorporate your contribution quickly and easily:

 Choose reviewer(s) and mention them in a comment (R: @username).
 Format the pull request title like [BEAM-XXX] Fixes bug in ApproximateQuantiles, where you replace BEAM-XXX with the appropriate JIRA issue, if applicable. This will automatically link the pull request to the issue.
 Update CHANGES.md with noteworthy changes.
 If this contribution is large, please file an Apache Individual Contributor License Agreement.

See the Contributor Guide for more tips on how to make review process smoother.

beforeCommit.message: [BEAM-10397] add missing environment in windowing strategy for Dataflow

afterCommit.message: [BEAM-10397] add missing environment in windowing strategy for Dataflow

nodes.bodyText: Can we always assume default environment here ? What about x-lang WindowingStrategies ? Probably this can be tested by running a x-lang GBK test with Dataflow with a WindowingStrategy.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -864,7 +867,7 @@ def run_GroupByKey(self, transform_node, options):
     windowing = transform_node.transform.get_windowing(transform_node.inputs)
     step.add_property(
         PropertyNames.SERIALIZED_FN,
-        self.serialize_windowing_strategy(windowing))
+        self.serialize_windowing_strategy(windowing, self._default_environment))

nodes.bodyText: Heejong clarified that what we pass here is just the default.
